scripts.build: npm run build:js -s & npm run build:css -s & npm run build:images -s
scripts.build:setup: npm run clean && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir scripts styles images && npm run build
scripts.build:css: postcss -m -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-properties -u postcss-calc -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-media-minmax -u postcss-custom-selectors -u postcss-color-function -u postcss-selector-matches -u postcss-selector-not -u postcss-nested -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers "> 1%" "IE 9" -u postcss-neat --postcss-neat.neatMaxWidth "100%" -o build/styles/main.css app/styles/main.css
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run livereload" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css"
scripts.prod: npm run prod:js & npm run prod:css & npm run prod:images
scripts.prod:setup: npm run clean && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir scripts styles images && npm run build
scripts.prod:js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t uglifyify app/scripts/main.js -o build/scripts/main.js
scripts.prod:css: npm run build:css && cssnano build/styles/main.css build/styles/main.css
scripts.lint: npm run jslint & npm run csslint
